transcript:
Customer: Hello.
Executive: Hanji sir, good morning.
Customer: Very good morning.
Executive: Ji, main Babbu baat kar raha hu IndiaMART head office se. Baat hui thi na aapki Sunday ko?
Customer: Haan.
Executive: Haan, aaj main wo check karwa deta hu.
Customer: Sunday ko na main thoda kaam mein hu.
Executive: Haan haan, main wo check kara leta hu. Uh, baaki aapne miss... haan, baaki aapne miss call kiya tha... aapne miss call kiya tha na customer care wale number pe?
Customer: Main karu aapko aisa aadhe ghante ke baad call?
Executive: Theek theek hai.
summary:
Concerns:

- Executive following up on a previous conversation.
- Customer was busy and requested to talk later.


Resolution:

- Agreed that the customer will call back in half an hour.


Next Steps: 
Customer will call back the executive in half an hour.

Alert (If Any):
None

@@@Sentiment:
- Neutral -> Neutral | Non-urgent

@@@Key Topics:
- callback, follow-up, missed call
